org.apache.karaf.system.management.internal

Class SystemMBeanImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.management.StandardMBean
      • org.apache.karaf.system.management.internal.SystemMBeanImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javax.management.DynamicMBean, javax.management.MBeanRegistration, SystemMBean

    public class SystemMBeanImpl
extends javax.management.StandardMBean
implements SystemMBean
    System MBean implementation.

      • getProperties

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getProperties(boolean unset,
                                                                      boolean dumpToFile)
                                                               throws javax.management.MBeanException
        Description copied from interface: SystemMBean
        Get all system properties.
        Specified by:
        getProperties in interface SystemMBean
        Parameters:
        unset - if true, display the OSGi properties even if they are not defined (with "undef" value).
        dumpToFile - if true, dump the properties into a file in the data folder.
        Returns:
        the list of system properties.
        Throws:
        javax.management.MBeanException - If a failure occurs.

        Specified by:

        Parameters:
        key - the system property key.
        value - the new system property value.
